for players in range(5,1,-1):
	newxpPerSecond = xpPerSecond+(5-players)**2
	print "\n"+str(players-1)+" vs 1:", newxpPerSecond
	counter = 0
	for lvl in levels:
		counter += 1
		print counter, str(int(lvl/newxpPerSecond/60))+":"+str((lvl/newxpPerSecond)%60)
